name: ScrollAreaScrollbar
description:
A vertical or horizontal scrollbar for the scroll area.
Renders a `<div>` element.

orientation.description: Whether the scrollbar controls vertical or horizontal scroll.

className.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

keepMounted.description: Whether to keep the HTML element in the DOM when the viewport isn’t scrollable.

render.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.

data-orientation.description: Indicates the orientation of the scrollbar.

data-hovering.description: Present when the pointer is over the scroll area.

data-scrolling.description: Present when the users scrolls inside the scroll area.
